name: CyberNight
description:
Made this in a week for Cyberpunk Jam 2019. This is my first game jam. I hope you like it.

A quick arcade style shooter set in a futuristic world where a group of rebel cyberpunks are at war with the corrupt government. Defend from the never ending waves of government-controller spider-drones and quickly move to each new defense point .

Controls: 

WASD- Move

Space- Fast Travel

Mouse- Aim and Shoot

Esc- Exit the game so don't accidentally push it.
